    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4059</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Skew Boreholes</string>
            <string language="es">Perforación oblicua</string>
            <string language="ga">Sceabhthollphoill</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieflaufbohrlöcher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forages Obliques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Boreholes Enviesados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pozzi trivellati Obliqui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λοξές γεωτρήσεις</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Article on skew boreholes featuring interesting background information, clear definitions as well as the solution to a sample question with accompanying explanations.</string>
            <string language="es">Artículo sobre perforación oblicua que ofrece una información de fondo interesante, definiciones sencillas, así como la solución a una pregunta de muestra con explicaciones adjuntas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Alt ar sceabhthollphoill ina bhfuil eolas cúlra suimiúil, sainmhínithe soiléire chomh maith le réiteach ar cheist samplach le mínithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technical Drawing</string>
            <string language="es">Dibujo técnico. Ejemplo con demostraciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Líníocht Theicniúil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worked Example</string>
            <string language="ga">Sampla Oibrithe</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Artikel auf den Schieflaufbohrlöchern, die 
interessante Hintergrundinformationen, freie Definitionen sowie die 
Lösung zu einer Beispielfrage mit dem Begleiten von von Erklärungen 
kennzeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Article sur les forages obliques comportant 
l'information de fond intéressante, définitions précises aussi bien
que la solution à une question d'échantillon avec accompagner des 
explications.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artigo nos boreholes enviesados que caracterizam 
a informação de fundo interessante, definições desobstruídas 
as.well.as a solução a uma pergunta da amostra com acompanhar 
explanações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Articolo sui pozzi trivellati obliqui che 
caratterizzano informazioni di base interessanti, definizioni precise 
così come la soluzione ad una domanda del campione con accompagnare 
le spiegazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρθρο σχετικά με τις λοξές γεωτρήσεις που 
χαρακτηρίζουν τις ενδιαφέρουσες βασικές πληροφορίες, τους σαφείς 
ορισμούς καθώς επίσης και τη λύση σε μια ερώτηση δειγμάτων με τη
συνοδεία των εξηγήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technische Zeichnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bearbeitetes Beispiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma Technique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemple Travaillé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenho Técnico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplo Trabalhado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione Tecnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempio Funzionato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνικό σχέδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασμένο παράδειγμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
